Package element.Static

Class HpBar

java.lang.Object
element.Element
element.Static.StaticElement
element.Static.HpBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementInterface
public class HpBar extends StaticElement
Class to contain and represent the heart objects which corresponds to the hp of the player.
Author:
Eduardo Correia, Jose Carvalho, Alberto Serra

  • Constructor Details

    • HpBar

      public HpBar​(PositionInterface position, String color, com.googlecode.lanterna.SGR format, String character)
      Constructor for the HpBar class. Receives a position, color, format, and character to represent the object.
      Parameters:
      position - sets the position of the element on the lanterna screen.
      color - sets the color of the element on the lanterna screen.
      format - sets the format of the element on the lanterna screen.
      character - sets the character of the element on the lanterna screen.
